youtube.title: Severe UV Exposure Effects: The Reality of Acute Sun Damage
youtube.description: Discover the biological impact of acute excessive exposure to UV rays. This video demonstrates the physical consequences of severe sun damage and why proper skin protection is essential for long-term health. Learn about the science behind sunburns and how to stay safe.
